psd:pset.name: clean
psd:pset.comment: Form images from visibilities. Handles continuum and spectral line cubes.

param.name: vis
param.help: name of input visibility file (MS)

param.name: alg
param.help: Algorithm to use (clark, hogbom, csclean, csfast). Default is clark.

param.name: niter
param.help: Number of iterations. Default=1000.

param.name: gain
param.help: The minor iteration loop gain. Default is 0.1.

param.name: threshold
param.help: Threshold flux level at which to stop cleaning (in Jy). Default is 0.Jy.

param.name: residual
param.help: name of residual image. Default is model name concatenated with ".residual".

param.name: image
param.help: name of restored image. Default is model name concatenated with ".restored".

param.name: model
param.help: name of model image. No default.

param.name: mask
param.help: name of mask image. No default.

param.name: mode
param.help: Type of processing (channel or velocity)

param.name: nchan
param.help: With mode, this defines the number of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: start
param.help: With mode, this defines the starting channel for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: width
param.help: With mode, this defines the width of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: step
param.help: With mode, this defines the step of channels for mapping of visibilities to image channels

param.name: imsize
param.help: The size of the output image (pixels).

param.name: cell
param.help: The image cell size (arcseconds).

param.name: stokes
param.help: Stokes params to image. Default is 'I'. Allowed: I, IV, IQU, IQUV

param.name: fieldid
param.help: Field IDs to include. Default is 1. Allows a vector of available field ids.

param.name: spwid
param.help: Spectral Window IDs to include. Default is 1. Allows a vector of available spectral window ids.

param.name: weighting
param.help: Type of weighting (natural, uniform, briggs, radial). Default is uniform.

param.name: rmode
param.help: Mode of Briggs weighting ('norm', 'abs', 'none'). Default is 'none'.

param.name: robust
param.help: Parameter in briggs weighting. Range -2.0 to 2.0. Default is 0.0.
